title: Bankruptcy Mortgage Proof of Claim: Proof of claim filed by servicing agent, but they didn't list name of owner of mortgage?
question: If the mortgage proof of claim is filed by the servicing agent, don't they still have to list the creditor or owner of the mortgage or attach an agreement proving their relationship with the owner?
answers: Are you the filing debtor? If yes, why don't you know who is the holder and servicer of your loan? If you are not the filing debtor, what is the reason you are raising this issue?
Yes they usually do attach assignments and allonges and list the name of the beneficial owner, which is often a long name with digits and roman numerals.
